Jargon Term: to keep you in a regular rhythm

Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: Medication changes: 1. Decrease Atenolol to 50 mg daily
2. Decrease Diovan to 80 mg daily - Take [**11-26**] of a 160mg pill daily
3. Start Nitroglycerin as needed for chest pain as directed
Weigh yourself every morning, call Dr. [**Last Name (STitle) **] if weight goes up more than 3 lbs in 1 day or 5 pounds in 3 days.
